name: Alienmist
description:
Story:

You are working at a space station, cunducting experiments on wormholes,
do they really exist?, and can we make them stay open so there will
be time to travel through? What will it be like to travel to another universe.
Those are some of the questions you have in mind.
One day when you sit in front of your computer working you feel a strange feeling,
a feeling you've never felt before. The whole existance seems to change,
the room you are in seems to shrink, moving in a direction, like if it was swallowed.
the next second everything turns black....
When you wake up,, you just don't know where you are,,,,

Features:



Three different weapons 'Shotgun ending' Enemies don't spawn at start, enemies spawn as game flows (no random spawn)
